metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24963 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in apr_encode functions of Apache Portable Runtime (APR) allows an attacker to write beyond bounds of a buffer. This issue affects Apache Portable Runtime (APR) version 1.7.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24963` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapr1 - 1.7.0-8ubuntu0.22.10.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> apr_encode_* API, which contains the affected code was added in version 1.7.0, so earlier version than that are not affected.

criterions.comment: apr package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.0-8ubuntu0.22.10.1').
